Definition at line 106 of file apsAIB.h.

Field Documentation

NwkRadius_t AIB_t::nonMemberRadius

Indicates how many hops of non-member nodes a multicast APS command may go through after leaving the group (used in NWK-layer multicasting). Valid range: 0 - 7, default value - 2.
